text: This is a list of airports in Palestine, grouped by type and sorted by location. There are no currently active airports in the State of Palestine. == Airports == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline style="font- weight:bold; background:#EEEEEE;" | Territory | Location | ICAO | IATA | Airport name | Fate |- style="font-weight:bold; background:#DDDDDD;" |- valign=top | Gaza Strip | Rafah | LVGZ | GZA | Yasser Arafat International Airport | Defunct, 2000A History of the RAF - Stations |- valign=top | Gaza Strip | Khan Yunis | LLAZ | GHK | Gush Katif Airport | Defunct, 2004RAF Gaza Airfield Wikimapia |- valign=top | West Bank | Ramallah | OJJR / LLJR | JRS | Jerusalem Atarot Airport | Disused 2000 onwardsAtarot and the Fate of the Jerusalem Airport |- valign=top | West Bank | Jenin | -- | -- | Muqeible Airfield | Defunct, post-WW2Times of India reports |} ==See also== * List of airlines registered with the Palestinian National Authority ==External links== *CIA World fact Book ==References== * Maurer, Maurer. title: List of airports in the State of Palestine
